remarks.format: ## Remarks 规范化维护其方向，但其大小将变为`1`。A normalized maintains its direction but its magnitude becomes `1`. 生成通常称为单位向量。The resulting is often called a unit vector. 一个规范化除以按其度量值。A is normalized by dividing the by its magnitude. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何规范化结构。The following example shows how to normalize a structure.
